rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: This space is designed to welcome guests while ensuring compliance with Vastu principles by maintaining a harmonious flow from the main entrance.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact but functional kitchenette space adhering to local building norms and designed in accordance with Vastu guidelines for prosperity.

rooms.name: Living Room and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan area that facilitates social gatherings while aligning entry points to maximize positive energy as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A private office space designed with natural light and minimal noise intrusion to foster productivity. The layout is optimized for a calm environment as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom is placed in the northeast corner to adhere to Vastu principles for health and prosperity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom that ensures privacy and compliance with local building codes.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious terrace that provides a vantage point and outdoor relaxation area, designed with open spaces to align with Vastu for energy flow.

openings.location: Staircase on the north side of the first floor
